thread.title: Micromax launches Canvas Spark 2, priced at Rs 3,999
thread.title_full: Micromax launches Canvas Spark 2, priced at Rs 3,999 - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Micromax launches Canvas Spark 2, priced at Rs 3,999
text:
NEW DELHI: Domestic handset-maker Micromax has launched a new smartphone - Canvas Spark 2 - at a price of Rs 3,999. 

"The Canvas Spark proved to be a huge success for Micromax, selling over half a million units in less than two months of its launch. With the Canvas Spark 2, we are yet again reaffirming our commitment to increase the smartphone and internet usage in the country," said its chief executive Vineet Taneja. 

"Currently, smartphone penetration stands at 12% in the country and 3G adoption is also barely 10%, which presents a huge opportunity to upgrade. We believe that the e-commerce channel is also expanding and the 3-4k category will be the next frontier," he added. 

The new smartphone will be powered by a 1.3Ghz quad-core processor and will have an internal memory of 4GB while running on the latest Android Lollipop. 

It will also sport a 5-inch display with a 5MP rear camera and a 2MP front camera.
